Compatible with iOS 10

Change and add a range of features to the iOS 10 Messages App.

Sick of the default iOS 10 Messages app? Well this tweak is for. It adds a heaps of features and more features coming every update. If you have any requests let me know via the credits section in the settings pane.

The screenshots below show the range of features available including
- Progress Bar with color changer
- Navigation Bar color
- Hide various items throughout the app
- A few emoji options
- Change the color of the send and plugin buttons

Known Bug

The color section turning the toggles on and off can cause your selected colors to be lost. I will have a look at this shortly.

Configure options from settings

Set custom backgrounds for your chats! Choose a custom background from the settings pane! Make sure to use a high quality image to make your Mesages app look sexy. Removed some broken features until I fix them. New Features:

- Change the color of message balloons and their text!
- Change the color heaps of the UI through out the Messages app
- Link to the source code of this tweak in the credits section of the preference pane

Bug Fixes:

- Added a toggle to hide the contact photo
- Everything is disabled by default so go configure in settings once you install
